Description.Text: Quest Windsor offers a range of 1, 2 & 3 Bedroom Apartments, containing full kitchen and laundry facilities, separate lounge & dining area, air conditioning, Foxtel, Complimentary WIFI internet and flat screen LCD televisions. Quest Windsor also provides baby cots and highchairs for hire. Also available for those travelling by car is onsite undecover secure car parking for a nominal fee.

Situated in the popular suburb of Prahran, Quest Windsor is perfect for families, leisure, corporate, interstate and international guests. Qust Windsor is within walking distance to the bustling Chapel and & Fitzroy Street, supermarkets, the St Kilda Road business precinct and Albert park Lake, home of the Australian F1 Grand Prix. Furthermore, the ideal location has easy access to the famous Crown Casino, Melbourne Sports and Aquatic Centre, MCG, AAMI Park, Hisense Arena, Rod Laver Arena and the Prahran Market which is only a short stroll away. Quest Windsor is ideally located to explore all that Melbourne has to offer.
This accommodation has a small lobby.
